Text: What conversion ratio of codec-bitrate is this one because the 142:7 version is nuked after 13min6sec.

bitrate = 76kbps
audio = MPEG layer 3
video compression- XVID

Played the video again & found no problem. Using KMP player alhough the original recording was for windows media. Have had problems with Windows Media 11 playing any videos and have stopped using it. Also have played film on both XP and Vista systems with no problem.
